definition[0]: to send the same message to many different people using email or the Internet, usually as a way of advertising something â€“ used to show disapproval
definition[1]: email messages that a computer user has not asked for and does not want to read, for example from someone who is advertising something
example[0]: You can filter out spam with special software.
definition[2]: a type of cheap canned meat made mainly from pork
definition[3]: to send advertising material or other information by email to people you do not know who have not asked for it
example[1]: You may get spammed if you give out your e-mail address online.
definition[4]: e-mail messages that a computer user has not asked for and does not want to read, for example messages from advertisers
example[2]: You can protect your computer from unwanted email spam.
